nodes.text: "Never Far Behind" (German title "Unvergessen") is a comic strip written by Jeremy Barlow, drawn by Cosmo White and edited by Gunther Nickel. The story was published in the 39th issue of the German Star Wars Rebels Magazine, which was released on December 20, 2017.
Star Wars Rebels Magazin #39: Unvergessen on Jedi-Bibliothek.de
